snippet.title: Gloomy Juncture | Steam Wishlist Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A gunshot set the threads in motion, you take the role of a mundane person about to meet his fate in a peculiar world...
Gloomy Juncture is a gritty hand-drawn adventure in the first-person. The player follows an intricate narrative by exploring hand-drawn 3D sceneries and triggering dynamic narrations and events while interacting with the environment.
The gameplay also revolves around pushing levers and buttons, talking to NPCs with fully voice acted dialogs, taking notes and collecting items, dealing with logical puzzles, deciphering riddles and solving creative environmental puzzles by exploring the surroundings in detail.

Wishlist now on Steam
